scripts.build:css: cat src/css/main.css | cleancss -O1 specialComments:0 -O2 restructureRules:on > css/main.min.css
scripts.build:js: uglifyjs src/js/main.js --compress --mangle toplevel -o js/main.min.js --comment --screw-ie8 --source-map "filename='js/main.min.js.map', root='/', url='main.min.js.map'"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html
scripts.build:watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:html'
